text: إِنَّمَآ إِلَـٰهُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَسِعَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ عِلْمًا

translation.en.sahih: Your god is only Allah, except for whom there is no deity. He has encompassed all things in knowledge."
translation.id.indonesian: Sesungguhnya Tuhanmu hanyalah Allah, yang tidak ada Tuhan selain Dia. Pengetahuan-Nya meliputi segala sesuatu".
